g.text: List of acronyms and notations used and their expansions and deﬁnitions.
absorption coefﬁcient of detrital particles and coloured dissolved organic
vertical attenuation coefﬁcient for downwelling irradiance
IOCCG International Ocean Colour Coordinating Group
MERMAID MERis MAtchup In Situ Database
NASA National Aeronautics and Space Administration
NCEP National Center for Environmental Prediction
OBPG Ocean Biology Processing Group (of NASA)
POLYMER POLYnomial based algorithmapplied to MERIS
VIIRS Visible and Infrared Imaging Radiometer Suite
The user community, including ecosystemmodellers and remote-sensing scientists, was polled
through an online questionnaire and phone calls as well as through targeted meetings at the beginning
], all of which together yielded responses fromabout one hundred scientists. A key
point that emerged fromthe consultation was that the products identiﬁed by GCOS [
radiances or remote-sensing reﬂectances at multiple wavelengths and chlorophyll concentration)
might be considered only a minimal set: the user community was also interested in additional
ocean-colour-derived products such as spectral inherent optical properties (IOPs, e.g., absorption and
scattering coefﬁcients of seawater and its particulate and dissolved constituents), primary production
For the spatial and temporal resolutions of the chlorophyll product, there were various
requirements depending on the user type (remote-sensing scientists or modellers) and on the
geographic scope of research (global or regional). Accordingly, spatial resolution requirements ranged
from1 kmor less for the remote-sensing scientists to 1
ranged fromdaily to monthly for both groups. In addition, users emphasised the importance of having
